name: HTML entities button
author: tmatsuur

sections.description:
HTML entities button is a few inserting HTML entities button add to the admin post/page editor(HTML mode).

Some features:

  • Insert HTML special characters.
  • Insert recent post link.
  • Insert emoticons.
  • Insert wpemoji.
  • Insert Dashicons.
  • Convert special characters to HTML entities.

Support

  • Japanese – https://elearn.jp/wpman/column/html-entities-button.html

Translators

  • Japanese(ja) – Takenori Matsuura
  • French(fr_FR) – [Emilie Colin]

You can send your own language pack to me.

Please contact to me.

  • https://12net.jp/ (ja)
  • @tmatsuur on twitter.

Contributors

  • Takenori Matsuura

Credits

This plug-in is not guaranteed though the user of WordPress can freely use this plug-in free of charge regardless of the purpose.
The author must acknowledge the thing that the operation guarantee and the support in this plug-in use are not done at all beforehand.

Contact

email to takenori.matsuura[at]gmail.com
twitter @tmatsuur
sections.installation:
• A plug-in installation screen is displayed on the WordPress admin panel.
  • It installs it in wp-content/plugins.
  • The plug-in is made effective.
sections.faq:
Emoticon button not found

Check for [Convert emoticons like ðŸ™‚ and ðŸ˜› to graphics on display] in Writing Settings.
sections.changelog:
2.2.0

  • Bug fix: Fixed a bug that prevented the buttons from being displayed in some environments. At the same time, we adjusted the color scheme and JavaScript to match version 5.7.

2.1.1

  • Fixed a bug that setting page were not displayed in user’s language.

2.1.0

  • Added insert Dashicons button.

2.0.0

  • Font for the editor can be changed.

1.7.0

  • Added insert wpemoji button.

1.6.0

  • Use classic smiley option was added.

1.5.3

  • Bug fix: Referring to the variable that does not exist.

1.5.2

  • Bug fix: A parameter of the function was adjusted.

1.5.1

  • Adjust the height of the buttons.

1.5.0

  • The properties page was added.

1.4.1

  • The appearance of the button was changed.

1.4.0

  • Added convert special characters button.

1.3.6

  • Bug fix for IE7
    • Recent post list style modified.

1.3.5

  • Bug fix at 1.3.4
    • Pulldown list style modified.

1.3.4

  • Modify button style for WordPress 3.3

1.3.3

  • Added French language

1.3.2

  • Bug fix for IE
    • Clear alert message.

1.3.1

  • English support

1.3.0

  • WordPress 3.3 b3 support(Bug fix)

1.2.0

  • Added emoticons button.

= 1.1.1
* Bug fix for IE 7

= 1.1.0
* Added resent post link button.

1.0.0

  • The first release.
